description.french: Entrer dans le château
description.italian: Entra nel castello
description.spanish: Entra en el castillo.
description.tchinese: 進入城堡
description.japanese: 城に入る
description.brazilian: Entre no castelo
description.latam: Entra al castillo.

description.english: Open the gate in the undergrowth
description.french: Ouvrir la porte du sous-bois
description.italian: Apri il cancello nel Sottobosco
description.spanish: Abre la puerta en la Maleza.
description.schinese: 在地下世界中打开大门
description.tchinese: 打開林下灌木叢中的門
description.japanese: 茂みの中のゲートを開く
description.brazilian: Abra o portão nas Raízes
description.latam: Abre la puerta en la maleza.

description.french: Battre DJ Aubergine
description.italian: Sconfiggi DJ Melanzana
description.spanish: Derrota a DJ Berenjena.
description.tchinese: 擊敗DJ茄子
description.japanese: DJエッグプラントを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote o DJ Berinjela
description.latam: Derrota a DJ Berenjena.

description.french: Terminer l'entraînement à la démolition
description.italian: Completa il corso di demolizione
description.spanish: Completa tu entrenamiento de demolición.
description.tchinese: 通過毀滅訓練營的訓練
description.japanese: 解体実習を修了する
description.brazilian: Conclua seu treino de demolição
description.latam: Completa el entrenamiento de demolición.

description.french: Donner plus de poussière d'étoile à Zig
description.italian: Dai più polvere di stelle a Zig
description.spanish: Alimenta a Zig con más polvo estelar.
description.tchinese: 將更多星塵餵食給席格
description.japanese: ジグにもっと星屑を食べさせる
description.brazilian: Alimente Zig com mais poeira estelar
description.latam: Dale más polvo estelar a Zig.

description.french: Battre Habanero
description.italian: Sconfiggi Habanero
description.spanish: Derrota a Habanero.
description.tchinese: 擊敗哈瓦那辣椒
description.japanese: ハバネロを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote o Habanero
description.latam: Derrota a Habanero.

description.french: Impressionner le prince des voleurs
description.italian: Fai colpo sul Principe Ladro
description.spanish: Impresiona al príncipe de los ladrones.
description.tchinese: 讓俠盜王子感到滿意。
description.japanese: 泥棒王子に実力を認めさせる
description.brazilian: Impressione o Príncipe dos Ladrões
description.latam: Impresiona al príncipe Ladrón.

description.german: Versorge Zig mit noch mehr Sternenstaub
description.french: Donner encore plus de poussière d'étoile à Zig
description.italian: Dai ancora più polvere di stelle a Zig
description.koreana: 지그에게 별 먼지를 더욱 더 먹이십시오.
description.spanish: Alimenta a Zig con más polvo estelar aún.
description.schinese: 给齐格喂更多更多星尘
description.tchinese: 將更多更多星塵餵食給席格
description.japanese: ジグにもっと星屑を食べさせる
description.polish: Daj Zigowi jeszcze więcej gwiezdnego pyłu
description.brazilian: Alimente Zig com ainda mais poeira estelar
description.latam: Dale aún más polvo estelar a Zig.

description.french: Calmer le minime apeuré
description.italian: Calma la minima spaventata
description.spanish: Tranquiliza a la súbdita asustada.
description.schinese: 让害怕的米尼姆平静下来
description.tchinese: 安撫受驚嚇的二分音符
description.japanese: 怯えているミニムをなだめる
description.brazilian: Acalme o minim assustado
description.latam: Tranquiliza al minim asustado.

description.german: Versorge Zig mit viel mehr Sternenstaub
description.french: Donner encore et toujours plus de poussière d'étoile à Zig
description.italian: Dai molta più polvere di stelle a Zig
description.koreana: 지그에게 별 먼지를 잔뜩 더 먹이십시오.
description.spanish: Alimenta a Zig con muchísimo más polvo estelar.
description.tchinese: 將大量星塵餵食給席格
description.russian: Скормите Зику еще и еще звездной пыли
description.japanese: ジグにもっと星屑を食べさせる
description.brazilian: Alimente Zig com muito mais poeira estelar
description.latam: Dale una cantidad enorme de polvo estelar a Zig.

description.french: Battre le roi Ferdinand Ier
description.italian: Sconfiggi Re Ferdinand I
description.spanish: Derrota al rey Ferdinand I.

description.japanese: 国王フェルディナンド1世を倒す

description.french: Ouvrir la porte du démon

description.brazilian: Abra a porta demoníaca

description.french: Créer la clé finale

description.spanish: Crea el acabajuegos.

description.japanese: ゲームエンダーを作る

description.french: Bannir le roi Ferdinand Ier

description.spanish: Destierra al rey Ferdinand I.
description.tchinese: 放逐國王費迪南一世
description.japanese: 国王フェルディナンド1世を追放する
description.brazilian: Expulse o Rei Ferdinando I
description.latam: Destierra al rey Ferdinand I.

description.french: Donner toute la poussière d'étoile à Zig
description.italian: Dai tutta la polvere di stelle a Zig
description.spanish: Alimenta a Zig con todo el polvo estelar.
description.schinese: 把所有的星尘喂给齐格
description.tchinese: 將所有的星塵餵食給席格
description.japanese: ジグにもっと星屑を食べさせる
description.brazilian: Alimente Zig com toda a poeira estelar
description.latam: Dale a Zig todo el polvo estelar.

description.spanish: Desbloquea a Mi Auu.

description.english: Play a song in the game garage

displayName.spanish: La batalla de silbatos de huevo

displayName.japanese: 卵とホイッスルとバトルと

description.english: Play a round of Versus Chaos
description.french: Jouer une manche en mode Chaos versus
description.italian: Gioca un round di Confronto nel caos
description.spanish: Juega una ronda de Enfrentamiento caótico.

description.japanese: カオス対戦を1ラウンドプレイする
description.brazilian: Jogue uma rodada de Caos Versus
description.latam: Juega una ronda de Versus caos.

description.english: Use the other team's egg against them in Versus Chaos
description.german: Setze im Versus-Chaos die Eier des anderen Teams gegen es ein.
description.french: Utiliser l'œuf des adversaires contre eux en mode Chaos versus
description.italian: Usa l'uovo dell'altra squadra contro di loro in Confronto nel caos
description.koreana: 대항전 혼돈에서 적의 달걀을 적에게 사용하십시오.
description.spanish: Usa el huevo del otro equipo en su contra en Enfrentamiento caótico.
description.schinese: 在混战中使用其他队伍的蛋对付他们
description.tchinese: 在混沌對決中使用敵對的雞蛋對付他們
description.russian: Используйте яйцо другой команды против нее же в соревновательном хаосе
description.japanese: カオス対戦で相手チームの卵をそのチームに使う
description.polish: Użyj jaja przeciwnej drużyny przeciwko nim w Chaotycznym pojedynku
description.brazilian: Use o ovo do outro time contra eles no Caos Versus
description.latam: Usa el huevo del otro equipo en su contra en Versus caos.

description.english: Play a song in the music lab
description.french: Jouer une chanson dans le labo de musique
description.italian: Suona una canzone nel Laboratorio musicale
description.spanish: Toca una canción en el laboratorio musical.
description.schinese: 在音乐实验室播放一首歌曲
description.tchinese: 在音樂實驗室中演奏一首曲子
description.japanese: ミュージックラボで曲を演奏する
description.brazilian: Toque uma música no Laboratório Musical
description.latam: Toca una canción en el laboratorio de música.

description.english: Get three stars on every level, with everyone playing on PRO difficulty
description.german: Erlange drei Sterne in jedem Level, wenn alle Spieler im Schwierigkeitsgrad „PROFI“ spielen
description.french: Obtenir trois étoiles dans chaque niveau (tout le monde doit jouer en difficulté PRO)
description.italian: Ottieni tre stelle in ogni livello, con tutti che suonano alla difficoltà PRO
description.koreana: 전원 전문가 난이도를 플레이하면서 모든 레벨에서 별을 세 개 획득하십시오.
description.spanish: Consigue tres estrellas en todos los niveles mientras todos juegan en dificultad PRO.
description.schinese: 在所有人难度都为职业时，在所有关卡都取得三颗星
description.tchinese: 在所有玩家難度皆為專業的設定下，於所有關卡取得三顆星
description.russian: Получите три звезды на каждом уровне, при этом все должны играть на сложности «профи»
description.japanese: 全員が難易度「プロ」でプレイし、すべてのステージで3スターを達成する
description.polish: Zdobądź trzy gwiazdki w każdym poziomie, gdy każdy gracz gra na poziomie trudności PRO
description.brazilian: Consiga três estrelas em todas as fases com todos tocando na dificuldade PRO
description.latam: Obtén tres estrellas en cada nivel; todos deben jugar en dificultad PROFESIONAL.
